alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Henrico; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:30PM EDT until August 10 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN CHARLES CITY...CENTRAL NEW KENT AND SOUTHEASTERN HENRICO COUNTIES... At 230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Roxbury, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Providence Forge and Adkins Store around 255 PM EDT. Ruthville around 315 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Wrights Corner, Quinton, Colonial Downs, Browns Corner, Sandybottom, Mountcastle, Barnetts, Elko, Roaches Corner and New Kent Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
